abstract: Team from Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology wins $2 million prize offered by Pentagon's Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency for development of robot that is mobile and also able to operate in hazardous environments; win validates work of JunHo Oh, who designed Hubo line of humanoid robots.
lead_paragraph: The robots were graded on their ability to complete eight tasks, including driving a vehicle, opening a door and operating a portable drill.

headline.main: Korean Robot Makers Walk Off With $2 Million Prize
headline.print_headline: Korean Team Wins Pentagon’s Crisis Robotics Contest

snippet: The robots were graded on their ability to complete eight tasks, including driving a vehicle, opening a door and operating a portable drill.

keywords.value: KAIST (Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology)
